page.title: 15Anstruther Playground Games
page.content:
{CHARIOTS}is a game in which the person who is "it" chases everyone until he catches someone. They then join hands and try to catch other people. Once 4 people have been caught the "chariot" breaks up and becomes 2 "chariots" and so on until everyone has been caught. The game restarts.
{ALLEVIO}is a game in which the person who is "on it" rolls up his sleeves and catches others. Once a person has been caught he also rolls up his sleeves and helps the first person to catch the others until everyone has been caught. The game starts again.
{HIGH TIG}is a game in which the only den is anything above ground level. One person is "on it" and if you get tug you are "on it" and the other one is "off".
